results.name: Number of ones in the binary expansion of 3^n.
comment: Conjecture: a(n)/n tends to log(3)/(2*log(2)) = 0.792481250... (A094148). - _Ed Pegg Jr_, Dec 05 2002
reference: S. Wolfram, "A new kind of science", p. 903.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Taylor Dupuy, David E. Weirich, Bits of 3^n in binary, Wieferich primes and a conjecture of Erdős, Journal of Number Theory, Volume 158, January 2016, Pages 268-280.
results.author: _Allan C. Wechsler_, Dec 11 1999
